com.projects.travelandshare.restcontroller

Class PlaceRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.projects.travelandshare.restcontroller.PlaceRestController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200")
 @RequestMapping(value="/api")
public class PlaceRestController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController for Place. It permit to get back the information in the model and communicate with the view

java.util.List<Place> getPlaceByCounty(@PathVariable(value="counties")
